formula.compoundSentence: Two or more independent clauses joined by conjunctions

usage.example: Teenagers are often very active and talkative.
usage.exampleVi: Thanh thiếu niên thường rất năng động và nói nhiều.

usage.example: She is a smart student, and she is an active member of our club.
usage.exampleVi: Cô ấy là một học sinh thông minh, và cô ấy là một thành viên tích cực trong câu lạc bộ của chúng tôi.

usage.example: He is a club member, but he has never participated in any activity.
usage.exampleVi: Anh ấy là thành viên câu lạc bộ, nhưng anh ấy chưa bao giờ tham gia bất kỳ hoạt động nào.

blocks.instruction: Identify which sentences are simple sentences
blocks.instructionVi: Xác định câu nào là câu đơn

questions.sentence: We work together on different projects.
Teenagers need good friends and tolerant teachers at school.
She plays chess very well, and she won the first prize last year.
Sports activities at school help me relax.
Teenagers should learn to work in groups and they should also have communication skills.

blocks.instruction: Label S for simple sentence and C for compound sentence
blocks.instructionVi: Ghi S cho câu đơn và C cho câu ghép

questions.sentence: Teenagers are often very active and talkative.
He often chats with friends on Facebook Messenger.
She is a smart student, and she is an active member in our club.
My friends and I participated in a sports competition last year.
He is a club member, but he has never participated in any activity.

blocks.instruction: Choose the correct conjunction to complete each sentence
blocks.instructionVi: Chọn liên từ đúng để hoàn thành mỗi câu

questions.sentence: Parents should give their children some freedom, _____ they should also set limits.
We don't cheat in exams, _____ it is wrong to do so.
Lan wants to join the school music club; _____, she can't sing or play any instruments.
Schoolwork gives teenagers a lot of pressure _____ they also feel pressure from parents.
She wanted to prepare for the exam; _____ she turned off her mobile phone.

blocks.instruction: Combine the sentences using the given conjunctions
blocks.instructionVi: Nối các câu sử dụng liên từ cho sẵn

questions.correctAnswer: Phong has to study harder; otherwise, he may fail the exam.
She is very sensitive; therefore, don't comment on her new hairstyle.
Mi wants to have more friends but she doesn't connect well with others.
Students can work in groups or students can work in pairs.
My friend likes showing off her new things so she often posts pictures on social media.
